title: Here is Canada
creator_credit: Tony Ianzelo, Colin Low and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Viewers outside Canada, and Canadians themselves, here have the pleasure of looking at, understanding, and discovering the many facets of this vast land, presented in choice film footage that is at once informative, visually appealing, and absorbing.
creator_credit_for_label: Tony Ianzelo, Colin Low and National Film Board of Canada
